text.p: If you modify this Program, or any covered work, by linking or combining it with runtime libraries of Erlang/OTP as released by Ericsson on https://www.erlang.org (or a modified version of these libraries), containing parts covered by the terms of the Erlang Public License (https://www.erlang.org/EPLICENSE), the licensors of this Program grant you additional permission to convey the resulting work without the need to license the runtime libraries of Erlang/OTP under the [name of library's license]. Corresponding Source for a non-source form of such a combination shall include the source code for the parts of the runtime libraries of Erlang/OTP used as well as that of the covered work.
